Python-style regex / format (0-based) is supported.
Example: (?P<actor>.+)のスターランクを(\d+)以上にしよう: Raise the Star Rank of {actor} to {1} or above
※ {actor} refer to the named capturing group, (?P<actor>.+)
※ {1} refer to the 2nd group, (\d+)
-->
